about_the_game:
No matter how many times you die. No matter how many times you die. Do not give up hope.

When the protagonist wakes up from sleep, he realizes that although he has lost his memory, he can acquire various resistances and abilities by dying, triggered by his own death.
He and his partner, a dog...? The protagonist and his partner, a dog, explore themselves and the world while defeating the creatures that attack them...
A new system of "deadly RPG" in which "death" makes you stronger physically and mentally in various ways.
Suffer, suffer, and become strong.

Features

  • A profound and magnificent worldview focusing on "suffering". Different "suffering" can be experienced in each stage.
  • The world changes drastically depending on the player's behavior. Multi-end scenario with abundant branches.
  • New graphics that combine the unique touch of dots and 3DCG.

content_descriptors.notes: This game deals a lot with “death” and includes depictions of “suicide” and “self-injury”. Also, depending on the scenario branch, there is a possibility of strong shocking expressions being depicted. If you are not good at such things or if you have a weak heart, please refrain from playing the game.

short_description: A deadly RPG with a new system that makes you stronger by dying and suffering.The graphics are a combination of dots and 3DCG, and the scenario is massive and branching. No matter how many times you die. No matter how many times you die. Don't give up hope.
